Cyprus - Khrysokhou Irrigation Project :

display_title.display_title:
Cyprus - Khrysokhou Irrigation
            Project : Loan 2279 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

18212944.admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
With the help of this project, Cyprus
            aims to transform an area in one of the least developed
            regions into a permanently irrigated area producing
            high-quality high-value horticultural crops mostly for
            export. It also hopes to resolve the area's
            under-employment problem by creating stable and remunerative
            employment opportunities for several hundred farm families.
            The components of the project include: (a) a dam and
            appurtenant structures; (b) a water conveyance system; (c)
            an irrigation system; (d) on-farm systems including
            pipelines, land smoothing, and vegetable and orchard
            planting; (e) groundwater development; and (f) provisions
            for project management and administration. The project would
            directly benefit about 640 families in the project area by
            generating additional on-farm and off-farm part-time
            employment thereby increasing farm incomes.
